original_text: When all the people Ishmael had with him saw Johanan son of Kareah and the army officers who were with him, they were glad.
korean_text: 이스마엘과 함께 있던 모든 백성이 가레아의 아들 요하난과 그와 함께 있던 모든 군 지휘관을 보고 기뻐한지라

sentences.original_text: When all the people Ishmael had with him saw Johanan
sentences.korean_translation: 이스마엘과 함께 있던 모든 백성이 요하난을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: and the army officers who were with him
